name: collections::btree::map::BTreeMap::<K, V, A>::iter_mut

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<coll.doc: Slightly mutably borrows the owned root node.

collections::btree::navigate::<impl coll.doc:
Splits a unique reference into a pair of leaf edges delimiting the full range of the tree.
 The results are non-unique references allowing mutation (of values only), so must be used
 with care.
